Package adrenaline.view.gui

Class GUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.view.gui.GUIController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserInterface
    public class GUIController
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserInterface
    Class that update and send data to the server and client

      • setUpdated

        public void setUpdated()
        Method invoked by a thread who just updated a portion of the game scene. It sets to true the updated flag and notify waiting threads to update other portions of game scene or start a new turn

      • chooseTargets

        public void chooseTargets​(java.util.List<TargetDetails> targets,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> compliantTargets,
                          java.util.List<SquareDetails> map,
                          boolean targetingScope)
        Method to choose the targets to shoot
        Parameters:
        targets - is the list of targets
        compliantTargets - is the list of compliant targets
        map - is the list of square details (they tells if a player is in the square or not)
        targetingScope - is a boolean to apply the targeting scope

      • askReload

        public void askReload​(java.util.List<WeaponDetails> weapons,
                      boolean isBeforeShoot)
        Method to ask the player if he wants to reload
        Parameters:
        weapons - is the list of unloaded weapons
        isBeforeShoot - true if asked during final frenzy in Shoot action

        Method to choose the new position of an enemy
        Parameters:
        targets - is the list of targets
        targetPaths - is the list of squares a player can be moved to

        finalRanking - is the final ranking

      • notifyTimeOut

        public void notifyTimeOut()
        Method to inform a player that he took to much time to make an action. The turn passes to the next player
